remarks: Given a nonempty convex class of surreals, there is a unique birthday-minimal element of that class.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 30-Jun-2011.)
statement:
nocvxmin $p |- ( ( A =/= (/) /\ A C_ No /\ A. x e. A A. y e. A A. z e. No ( ( x <s z /\ z <s y ) -> z e. A ) ) -> E! w e. A ( bday ` w ) = |^| ( bday " A ) ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
